title: RACE TRACK detail page Â» TRACK LAYOUTS
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see all TRACK LAYOUTS that exist or existed for a RACE TRACK\
So I can find out how the track evolved over time
description:
* The RACE TRACK detail page contains a section with a list of all connected TRACK LAYOUTS.
* Each TRACK LAYOUT in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each TRACK LAYOUT in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each TRACK LAYOUT in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no TRACK LAYOUT connected to the RACE TRACK then the section is not displayed at all.
